name: CupertinoSliverRefreshControl
desc: A sliver widget implementing the iOS-style pull to refresh content control.

fields.name: refreshTriggerPullDistance
fields.desc: The amount of overscroll the scrollable must be dragged to trigger a reload.

fields.name: refreshIndicatorExtent
fields.desc: The amount of space the refresh indicator sliver will keep holding while [onRefresh]'s [Future] is still running.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: A builder that's called as this sliver's size changes, and as the state changes.
